title: New Pearl Jam album ad
content:
Is this a known font or is it a custom job, i really like the E...  
Thanks in advance..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829163923im_/http:/typophile.com/files/billboard_031306-1_5897.jpg)

 [‹ (x) tech sans on drum'n'bass poster sans - Isonorm {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829163923/http:/typophile.com/node/19688 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Horizon" condensed bold serif typeface - Times {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829163923/http:/typophile.com/node/19673 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Locash

comments.content: Hmm, it looks like they took Eurostile and squashed it then teared it apart it in Illustrator before adding/shaping the differing characters. Look at “2ND”, that IS Eurostile I’m sure.
yeah, that “2” is eurostile for sure.
